channel.title: Commands
channel.description: hey guys how do i add my own commands?? and on some servers like where they have ::modwere and stuff how do i do that?? ty 4 your time

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Commands can complete many functions. Below are some of the functions they can perform.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("basic")) { addItem(####, #); sendMessage("Basic"); teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; method(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

What do you mean Normal commands or tele commands???
Some codes:
normall commands for items
Search command
Until you see like this : if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("InfHpRing")&& playerRights >= 2){
add under the last }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")&& playerRights >= RIGHTS){ // RIGHT 1,2,3,?
add under that

addItem(ITEMID,AMOUNT); // Example 8002,1 sendMessage("MESSAGE"); // if you do ::COMMANDNAME u get message }
Teleport commands
Search edge
until you see like : } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("edge")) {
add under the last }

 } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")) // You can add &&playerRights >= RIGHTS){ for Mod zone tele

add under that

if(teleblock == true){ //Dont change this sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //You can change if you want } else { addItem(ITEMID,AMOUNT); // This is only if you want give item if tele other delte this teleportToX = XCORDS; teleportToY = YCORDS; sendMessage("MESSAGE"); // Your message }

Read full topic

client.java

search for if (command.startsWith

make under it if (command.startsWith("commandnamehere") && playerrights >= playerrightshere) {

now add what you want it do to like additem ####, #
